title: (x) Funky hand-drawn Somos logo - various similar {gang}
content:
Hello- To the best of my limited knowledge, the attached logo was hand-drawn. Does anyone have a suggestion for a font with similar characteristics that I could use as a substitute? The "o's" are not a problem; They're simple circles. The funky "s" and the "m" might be more of a challenge though? Any ideas folks?  
Thanks! DK~

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [somos.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019131555/http:/typophile.com/files/somos.gif) | 4.65 KB |
author: Da Kine

comments.content:
Not exactly the same, but Mark Simonson's [Mostra Heavy](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019131555/http:/www.ms-studio.com/FontSales/mostra.html) might be a nice alternative.

- Lex

Lex-  
Thanks! Mostra is in the ballpark for sure. It's actually the closest I've seen so far to the original. Any other inspired ideas folks?  
DK~
It's not exactly close, but FF cutout has the same thick forms.

What about [David Berlow](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019131555/http:/typophile.com/wiki/David%20Berlow)'s [BerlinSans](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019131555/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=FF.2958.6.3&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=SOMOS&sampleSize=48), based on a design by [Lucian Bernhard](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019131555/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Lucian%20Bernhard)? Slightly more organic, but maybe that's not such a bad thing

Gadzooks and Thanks One and All-  
All your suggestions are excellent... I never thought there would be anything that close to the original!  
DK~
